tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Dr. Manish jha has been treating me for the last 7 months with metal braces and I have noticed a huge difference in my smile. Doctor has always put my comfort and opinion first. He also gave me other options rather than just extracting teeth and treated me accordingly. I am very satisfied with the on going treatment and it's a painless one.He is a very professional, efficient and sincere orthodontist as well as a very calm and patient human being who always explains the treatment to me and clear all my doubts. He has always been very lenient in terms of appointment and availability. I have never faced a single inconvenience. I would recommend Dr. Manish jha to everyone who wants to see a big change in their smile. Thank you!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
